rich_text.text: Whilst at Phantom Agency, I worked on our Financial Times brief to create a prestigious, smooth site for the Audemars Piguet watch partnership. Unfortunately, this campaign has come to an end so the link is no longer available. But I can promise you it was very smooth :). The site had an about page, a video page which displayed the four watches in the campaign, and a carousel which displayed details about each watch.

built_with.text: This site was built with Vanilla Javascript, no framework was used. I used the library Jump.js for the scrolling transitions.
